item.title: Stupid ::yell command [delta]
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

Use this one:

[code]if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 0) {
String titles = “”;

            if (playerRights == 1) {
                titles = "[Moderator] ";
            }
            if (playerRights == 2) {
                titles = "[Admin] ";
            }

	if (playerRights == 0) {
                titles = "[Player] ";
            }

            if (playerRights == 3) {
                titles = "[Co-Owner] ";
            }
	
	
	if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("OWNERNAMEHERE")) {
                titles = "@red@[OWNER]";
            }[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Stupid ::yell command [delta]
item.dc:creator: @sk1llmunky sk1llmunky
item.description:
@sk1llmunky wrote:

Ok, so this is the command and like, when i compile it only gives me 1 error and its about

talk(titles + "" + playerName + ": " + command.substring(5));

if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5 && (playerRights >= 1 || donator == 1)) { String titles = ""; if (playerRights == 1) { titles = "[MOD] "; } if (playerRights == 2) { titles = "[ADMIN] "; } if (playerRights == 3) { titles = "[CO-OWNER] "; } if (donator == 1) { titles = "[DONOR] "; } if (playerRights == 1 && donator == 1) { titles = "[MOD-DONOR] "; } if (playerRights == 2 && donator == 1) { titles = "[ADMIN-DONOR] "; } if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Frostyboy07")) { titles = "[OWNER] "; } talk(titles + "" + playerName + ": " + command.substring(5)); }

Read full topic
